on the rebound.translation[0].definition: someone who is on the rebound is upset or confused because their romantic relationship has just ended
He first met me when I was on the rebound, after splitting up with Mark.
a ball that is on the rebound has just hit something and is moving back through the air
I caught the ball on the rebound.
something that is on the rebound is starting to increase or improve again
The market seems to be on the rebound.
